visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays (opacity 0.03) on backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.
effects: Glow: Drop shadows with colored spread for 'neon' effect.
Glitch: Hover effects on main titles.

image_urls.logo_placeholder: Use text 'SPARK PIT' in Rajdhani Bold with Amber color.

media.rules: Images should be desaturated or tinted with the primary color (Amber) to blend into the dark theme. Avoid bright, happy stock photos.

motion.loading: Use a 'blinking cursor' or 'progress bar' style loader instead of a spinner.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #EDEDED or #A1A1AA on dark backgrounds. Avoid dark grey text on black.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings in Amber (#FFAA00) for keyboard navigation.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. UPDATE TAILWIND: Modify `tailwind.config.js` to include the custom colors (Electric Amber, Cyber Cyan) and fonts.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'App Shell' first with a fixed sidebar and scrollable main content area.
4. BOUNTY BOARD: Implement the bounty list as a grid of 'Cyber Cards' with the defined styles.
5. CHAT: Ensure the chat interface feels like a terminal or IRC clientâ€”dense, mono-spaced timestamps, clear distinction between user and bot messages.

6. USE SHADCN: Use the existing components but OVERRIDE the default styles with the classes defined in 'components' section above. Do not use the default rounded-lg styles; go for sharp edges (rounded-none or rounded-sm).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: `transition: all`. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add `.App { text-align: center; }` in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
